description:
Vaughn is a Persian guy that I was trying so hard to get to grow out some of his chest hair. I knew fans of hirsute guys would love to have a Monday taste treat. He works out a lot so I guess he was not keen on hiding his body, and stuck with the trimmed look.
Though, if you like dudes with fully natural pubes, you are bound to get a hair caught in the back of your throat with Vaughn. The boy has got major bush!
Vaughn loves playing and watching sports yet is an intellectual type of guy. He seemed very obsessed with sports, along with fucking girls up the ass. The bigger the ass the better.
He also mentioned that he thought it would be hot if you guys would get turned-on by watching and admiring his body as he jerked-off. A true exhibitionist? We will see just how far he is willing to go!
title: Vaughan Amir - Solo
